This is a common issue caused by a ServiceNow Solutions Consultant performing an E2E ITOM Demo.

The Resolution is to simply restart the MySQL Database.

There is a Remediation Action Created to facilitate that activity. 

Steps:

  1. Go to the alarm group or alarm for the MySQL Server Instance
  2. Right Click on the alarm and select "Quick Response"
  3. Select " Restart MySQL Service "
  4. Wait for Remediation to complete
  5. Once All Alarms have cleared the ticket will be resolved
  6. Verify the Site is back online
  7. Close the ticket.
